title: AMPLIFY: Actionless Video Dynamics for Robotic Learning
abstract: We present AMPLIFY, a novel approach to learning robotic dynamics from actionless video sequences. Our method achieves significant improvements in pose prediction accuracy through inverse dynamics modeling over actionless priors.

title: Modular Reinforcement Learning for Embodied AI Systems
abstract: This work introduces a modular framework for training embodied AI agents with improved sample efficiency and transfer capabilities across different robotic platforms.

title: Deep Reinforcement Learning for Complex Manipulation Tasks
abstract: We demonstrate the effectiveness of deep RL for learning complex manipulation policies, achieving state-of-the-art performance on several benchmark tasks.
